Payment creation: Click on <dummy_link> Go to Tools > Setup > Basics > Create payment
Payment Successful: Payment is successful if you get an acknowledgement via an email
Add new fund and account details: To add a new fund and account details raise a request in <dummy_link> with the approval from your immediate manager
Transaction id of payment: The transaction ID is the payment is successful could be found in Account tab under profile section of the link <dummy_link>
Cross country accounts: you can have same account accross countries in that case fxrate will be applied to local currency of country
Number of accounts: you can have multiple accounts across the country one for receive and one for deliver
